short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the names of presidential candidates with much better descriptors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hey... this election is depressing, right? These candidates are making a mockery of American democracy.

Well, time to join them. This extension replaces their names with better, funnier words. It'll help keep your blood pressure down* while you read online coverage of the Ridiculous Farce of 2016.


*Extension does not actually lower blood pressure, you mouth-breathing Trump supporter.
